notes.author: Martin Wegmann <martin.wegmann@sap.com>
notes.text: SAPUI5 HTTP Handler for Application Resources (UI Add-On 2.0 for SAP NetWeaver): The default values for resource '.UI5RepositoryAppSetup' have been adjusted, see SAP Note 2187043.

notes.author: Martin Wegmann <martin.wegmann@sap.com>
notes.text: SAPUI5 Cache Buster for Applications (UI Add-On 2.0 for SAP NetWeaver): 404 response of requests to nonexistent resources now cached, see SAP Note 2186104.
